entry.title: Apple OEM Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) FireWire Adapter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: OEM Wall Charger
Price: 29.99

Easily connect your Thunderbolt-equipped Mac to a FireWire device with the Apple Thunderbolt to FireWire Adapter. Small and compact, it connects to the Thunderbolt port on your Mac computer, giving you a FireWire 800 port that supplies up to 7W for bus-powered peripherals like hard drives and audio devices.

System Requirements : 
OS X v10.7.4 or later
Thunderbolt-equipped Mac computer

entry.title: Apple OEM Mini Display Port to DVI Adapter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: OEM Wall Charger
Price: 19.99

  • Mini DisplayPort (M) to DVI (F) connections
  • Use an external display as your main workspace or to extend your desktop, or you can work in mirrored mode with a projector so you can view what your audience sees
  • Connect an advanced digital monitor, such as the 20- or 23-inch Apple Cinema Display, that includes a DVI connector

entry.title: Apple OEM USB-C Charge Cable - 1 Meter (Retail Pack)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: OEM Cables
Price: 12.99

This 1-meter charge cable — with USB-C connectors on both ends — is ideal for charging, syncing, and transferring data between USB-C devices. Pair the USB-C Charge Cable with a compatible USB-C power adapter to conveniently charge your devices from a wall outlet and take advantage of fast-charging capabilities. USB-C Power Adapters sold separately.

Apple recommends the following pairings:

11-inch iPad Pro (1st and 2nd generation), 12.9-inch iPad Pro (3rd and 4th generation), and iPad Air (4th generation) with the 20W USB-C Power Adapter

entry.title: Apple OEM USB ‑ C to USB adapter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: OEM Wall Charger
Price: 24.99

Apple USB ‑ C to USB adapter :

With the USB ‑ C to USB adapter you can connect iOS devices and many common USB accessories to a USB ‑ C or Thunderbolt 3 (USB ‑ C) enabled Mac.

Connect the USB-C end of the adapter to a USB-C or Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) port on your Mac. And then connect a flash drive, camera or other standard USB device. With a Lightning to USB cable you can also sync and charge your iPhone, iPad or iPod.

entry.title: Apple OEM 12W USB Power Adapter - Retail Packaged
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: OEM Wall Charger
Price: 18.99

Use this compact and convenient USB-based power adapter to charge your iPad with Retina display at home, on the road, or whenever it's not connected to a computer. You can connect the adapter directly to your iPad via the Lightning connector.

Featuring a compact design, this power adapter offers fast, efficient charging. It also charges iPhone and all iPod models.

Charging cable sold separately.

entry.title: Apple OEM Lightning to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Adapter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: Earpods
Price: 8.49

  • Original Apple Manufactured Product. Sold in Bulk
  • Apple OEM Lightning to 3.5mm Headphone Jack Adapter
  • This adapter lets you connect devices that use a 3.5mm audio plug to your Lightning devices
  • Works with all devices that have a Lightning connector and support iOS 10 or later, including iPod touch, iPad and iPhone.
  • Compatible with iPhone 12, 12 Pro, 12 Pro Max, 12 Mini, 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, SE 2nd Gen, XR, XS Max, XS, X, 8 Plus, 7 Plus, iPad Pro, iPad mini 4, iPad Air 2, iPad nano and other Apple devices.

entry.title: Apple OEM 5W USB Power Adapter - Retail Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: OEM Wall Charger
Price: 11.99

  • Connect your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with USB cable to Apple USB power adapter for convenient charging from a wall outlet.
  • Apple USB Power Adapter 5W (White) is small, stylish device for charging or continuously powering your iPod or iPhone when you're away from your computer.
  • This lightweight, USB-based, fixed prong adapter/charger stores easily for travel and is compatible with any docking iPhone or iPod. 
  • Original Apple Manufactured Product.
  • Compatible with iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, SE 2nd Gen, XR, XS Max, XS, X, 8 Plus, 7 Plus, iPad Pro, iPad mini 4, iPad Air 2, iPad nano and other Apple devices.

entry.title: Apple OEM USB-C to Lightning Cable - 1 Meter (BULK)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: Charge/Sync Cables
Price: 14.00

  • Connect your iPhone, iPad, or iPod with Lightning connector to your USB-C or Thunderbolt 3 (USB-C) enabled Mac for syncing and charging, or to your USB-C enabled iPad for charging.
  • You can also use this cable with your Apple 18W, 20W, 29W, 30W, 61W, 87W or 96W USB‑C Power Adapter to charge your iOS device and even take advantage of the fast-charging feature on select iPhone and iPad models.
  • Apple Cable is 1 meters (3.3 feet) long
  • Data transfer rates up to 10Gbps 2x faster
  • Original Apple Manufactured Product.

entry.title: Apple OEM EarPods with Lightning Connector (BULK)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Apple
Type: Earpods
Price: 17.99

  • Earpods designed in such a way that is comfortable for most people.
  • The speakers inside the EarPods have been engineered to maximize sound output and minimize sound loss, which means you get high-quality audio.
  • The EarPods with Lightning Connector also include a built-in remote that lets you adjust the volume, control the playback of music and video, and answer or end calls with a pinch of the cord.
  • Original Apple Manufactured Product.
  • Compatible with iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, SE 2nd Gen, XR, XS Max, XS, X, 8 Plus, 7 Plus, iPad Pro, iPad mini 4, iPad Air 2, iPad nano and other Apple devices.
